Amanda Visconti is a research web developer and digital humanities professor. I design, prototype, & study digital interface UX for social reading & learning, grounding my work on a strong research background (recent PhD, MS) in HCI, info science, & the digital humanities (literature, history...).

Contact me to collaborate, or check out my online portfolio & resume & Twitter.

It's a way to take a bunch of separate ideas and visually map out how they're related... more
